item.title: John Denver - Take Me Home, Country Roads
item.description: Play along video for the song Take Me Home, Country Roads performed by John Denver. Chords used in the song: A, D, E7, F♯m, G.

item.title: John Denver - Take Me Home, Country Roads - Key of G
item.description: Play along video for the song Take Me Home, Country Roads performed by John Denver. Chords used in the song: C, D, D7, Em, F, G.

item.title: John Denver - Leaving on a Jet Plane - Key of G
item.description: Play along video for the song Leaving on a Jet Plane performed by John Denver. Chords used in the song: Am, C, D, G.
